title: OpenAPI Initiative: New Standards and a Peek at the Roadmap
author: Lorna Mitchell
description: The OpenAPI Overlay Specification makes it easier to repeat the same updates to a description. The OpenAPI Arazzo Specification offers guidance for outlining a sequence of API calls.
tags: improvements to the wording in the specification document
cntitle: OpenAPI Initiative：新标准及路线图一览
cndescription: OpenAPI Overlay Specification 使重复更新描述变得更加容易。OpenAPI Arazzo Specification 为概述 API 调用的顺序提供了指导。
